short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Count CCM and RPM time directly from EHR software into Evelyn

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This innovative tool is designed to accurately and efficiently count the time spent by healthcare providers with their patients within the EHR software.

The extension is essential for RPM (Remote Patient Monitoring) and CCM (Chronic Care Management) in Evelyn, ensuring precise time-tracking that significantly enhances billing accuracy. The tool automatically logs the time for each patient interaction, reducing manual tracking errors and freeing up more time for healthcare providers to focus on their patients.

The Evelyn Time Tracker is a game-changer for healthcare professionals seeking a seamless, reliable, and efficient method for monitoring time spent with patients. With its user-friendly interface and robust functionality, it's more than just a time tracker - it's a tool to improve patient care and streamline workflow within the EHR software environment.
